column5: Just thought some folks might be interested in reading about this  http://www.sportsnet.ca/hockey/2012/08/02/owne_nolan_hosts_fishing_hunting_show/
Good for him,I know he was on the fish tv show for a while,but haven't seen him for some time.
Yea, I remember seeing him on there a bit as well. I was a pretty big fan of his in his younger years in the NHL and hope his new show succeeds.
I bet his knees go out, half way through filming a show! That was a joke by the way! Good luck to Nolan! HH
I'll be interested to see what he has to offer, But given that the majority of TV fishing shows majorly suck, I'm not getting my hopes up.
You got that right Craig.  Bring back the Red Fisher show!!! Now that was a show worth watching.
I thought he looked like he didn't really know what he was doing when he was on fish tv, anybody else get this impression?
if my memmory is correct he did a lot of duck hunting with Mike Ricci over the past few years.  based on what I recall from twitter... I wish him luck.
Lucky guy, first he's an NHL star making millions, now an outdoor tv host! Will be interesting how the show turns out

Saturday and sunday mornings I watch fishing shows regardless of how much the "suck"... Still beats all the other crap on tv.  I hope he invites Dominic Hasek as a guest, points to a log, casts and pulls in a 5lbs largemouth
